title: AI&Data Consulting Intern
content: Hosted several public lectures on GenAI applications in a local university; Developed an enterprise data platform UI Demo for a local major bank; Assisted in building a pitch deck for a multi-national hospitality group.

title: Analyst Programmer Intern
content: Implemented an efficient automated risk assessment system for ingesting gigabytes of data; Conducted different financial analysis on different asset classes in APAC market.

title: Bloomberg Market Concept
content: The program provides a comprehensive understanding of various financial concepts and the functioning of global financial markets. It also covers a wide range of topics, including economics, fixed income, equities, currencies, and commodities.

title: AWS Cloud Practitioner
content: The AWS Cloud Practitioner certification covers essential topics such as cloud concepts, AWS core services, security and compliance, pricing and billing, and architectural best practices. It provides a broad overview of the AWS Cloud and its key components, enabling individuals to grasp the fundamentals of cloud computing.

title: Software Engineering Intern
content: Developed a server configuration report generator for HKEX Client; Developed a function menu along with several shell scripts for market system maintenance; Tested, enhanced and integrated a experimental log monitoring engine into existing market data systems.

title: AWS Educate Ambassador
content: Received training on AWS Technology; Hosted several talks on Web3 Topics.

title: Academic Exchange
content: I love UNC. Travelled around US to explore foreign food and sceneries, made a lot of great local friends; Also took several ML courses.

title: Society President
content: Being the leader for the first time, I had fun and organized numerous events for sharing practical IT knowledge and the industry landscape.

title: The Beginning
org: The Chinese University of Hong Kong
content: The start of my Computer Science journey, CUHK Computer Science graduating in 2025 Summer.
